quests.desc: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. Your first objective is to head north. Following that, attempt to move west. Then, try to travel west. That done, make an effort to move south. With that done, move west. Okay, and then, go to the west. Okay, and then, make an effort to go south. After that, take a trip east. Okay, and then, retrieve the type 1 passkey from the floor of the dish-pit. And then, lock the type 1 safe inside the dish-pit with the type 1 passkey. That's it!
commands: lock type 1 safe with type 1 passkey
lock type 1 safe with type 1 passkey

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the dish-pit.

 You can see a type 1 safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type 1 safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The type 1 safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. An usual kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You're now in the cubicle.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You're now in a closet.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a trunk.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Hmm. You always thought you'd be more excited to see a trunk in a room.[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The table appears to be empty. Aw, here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've entered a workshop.

 [if c_2 is locked]A locked[else if c_2 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] safe, which looks normal, is close by.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the office.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. A normal kind of place.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a type 5 locker.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The type 5 locker contains [a list of things in the c_3]. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The type 5 locker is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've entered a shower.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a drawer.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Now why would someone leave that there?[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a shelf. The shelf is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] Were you looking for a board? Because look over there, it's a board. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

You find yourself in a scullery. A normal one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

 You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A standard kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 You can see a bed. [if there is something on the s_3]On the bed you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a mantle. The mantle is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the mantle you make out [a list of things on the s_4]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the mantle.[end if] You see a bed stand. The bed stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_5]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] However, the bed stand, like an empty bed stand, has nothing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna. You begin to take stock of what's here.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. An usual kind of place.

 You make out a basket. The light flickers for a second, but nothing else happens.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The basket contains [a list of things in the c_7]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] What a letdown! The basket is empty![end if] You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a bench. [if there is something on the s_6]On the bench you can see [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]However, the bench, like an empty bench, has nothing on it. This always happens![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

 You can see a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_7]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

 You can see a soap scented safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The soap scented safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] What a letdown! The soap scented safe is empty![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
You've entered a steam room. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You scan the room for a counter, and you find a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the counter you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. This always happens![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You make another one of your grand eccentric entrances into a washroom.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: launderette
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the launderette. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You can make out a chest. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_10]. Huh, weird.[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] What a letdown! The chest is empty![end if] You can make out [if c_9 is locked]a locked[else if c_9 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] spherical chest in the corner.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The spherical chest contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] The spherical chest is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

walkthrough: lock type 1 safe with type 1 passkey

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First of all, make an attempt to take a trip north. After that, move west. If you can finish that, move west. After that, venture south. After that, head west. And then, attempt to go to the west. Once you get through with that, travel south. Then, go east. Okay, and then, recover the type 1 passkey from the floor of the dish-pit. After picking up the type 1 passkey, lock the type 1 safe. And if you do that, you're the winner!
